summary: Access and summon your Magic Box from anywhere in Tamriel, summon multiple Magic Boxes. Simple, quick, magic.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]QDbWtF55b8Y[/youtube]
\"Because someone beat me to a Bag of Holding\"

Description
===========
Access and summon your Magic Box from anywhere in Tamriel, summon multiple Magic Boxes. Simple, quick, magic.

Location
========
The player will first see the Magic Box near Honningbrew Meadery outside Whiterun. 

Upon activation you will also meet it\'s creator.

Map location in mod folder/images.

Details
=======
Adds 2 new spells to the game. One that lets you summon a Magic Box, the other that lets you open it\'s inventory without having to do anything else than cast a spell. Access and summon your Magic Box from anywhere in Tamriel, summon multiple Magic Boxes, different boxes, same inventory. Simple, quick, magic.

Install
=======
1. Copy the .esp file and Scripts folder to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
2. Start Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file.

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file.
2. Delete the .esp file from (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\


Incompatibility
===============
No incompatibility issues.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
The chests will spawn underneath the player facing the same way. This is semi intentional as it allows precise placements for however you want it to look and I couldn\'t get it to work with target locations.

History
=======
1.0, 3/24/2012 - Initial release.

Contact
=======
You can find me on the official Bethesda forums as \'PR0 6AM3R\'
You can find me on the Nexuses as \'PR0 6AM3R\'

Credits
=======
Thanks to everyone in the modding community for helping me when I needed it.
Thanks to Bethesda for a great series of games.
Thanks to SkyrimNexus.com for the a one-stop-shop for modders and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator.

Tools Used
==========
Creation Kit
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod. I would also like to know what mods are including my work.
